reviewText: I bought this tape brand new, still in its wrapper. The sound is horrible and its fuzzy and it rolls. I wish, wish, wish this would come out in DVD form. This is my favorite workout video and it would be amazing to have it on DVD. Someone please make this happen. Thank you

These tapes are no good. Everyone of these tape I bought did the same thing its fuzzy and sounds horrible and look bad.as if somebody is reproduce in the same tapes and selling them to different company.
